backend/main.mo: Defines the Ribbit canister with data models, storage mixins, access control state, maps for ponds, posts, ribbits, users, tags, activity tracking, and a public function to increment post view counts.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence entries mapping frontend files to implemented requirements for pond feed, about sidebar, and desktop layout behavior.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short summaries of multiple frontend files describing their purpose, layout behavior, and key UI functionality.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the root React app and includes metadata, favicon, and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, wraps the app in ThemeProvider, and defines all page routes including SavedLiliesPage.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Bookmark toggle button using useBookmarks hook to mark or unmark lilies with click handling.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with navigation links and a caffeine.ai attribution section.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with logo, search, navigation buttons, mobile menu, user avatar, and create menu.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout containing header, footer, main outlet, and mobile left sidebar drawer that closes on route change.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Navigation sidebar showing links and recent activity, with active state detection and conditional mobile drawer styling.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Displays a lily post with metadata, image handling, interactions (likes, shares), and optional user or pond avatar.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Mobile-only slide‑in drawer that shows the LeftSidebar and manages body scroll lock.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Shows pond details, stats, moderators, and join/leave controls with loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Renders a recursive ribbit (comment) with likes, replies, indentation, and avatar loading.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Right sidebar showing trending ponds, popular tags, and recent popular posts with loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity, invalidating related queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmark state for lily IDs with localStorage persistence and provides helpers to toggle, add, remove, and clear bookmarks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login flow, status tracking, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with React Query hooks for ponds, profiles, membership, and mutations with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, theme variables for light and dark modes, and utility classes for UI consistency.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Formats large numbers into short forms like k, M, and B with simple decimal rounding.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares a lily link using the Web Share API with clipboard fallbacks and toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Handles user identity and settings in localStorage including username generation, Froggy Phrase storage, hashing, backup, and restoration.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Implements per-lily cooldown logic using localStorage to throttle view count increments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static about page describing platform features and community guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Lists all ponds with loading states, membership indicators, and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Form for creating a lily post with support for text, images, links, pond selection, and tag suggestions.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Form for creating a new pond with validation, image uploads, and custom froggy phrase handling.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main feed showing lilies with sorting, search results, sidebars, and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Displays a single lily with ribbits, likes, view tracking, and posting new ribbits.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Displays pond details, moderators, membership status, and allows users to leave the pond with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Shows a pond’s feed with lilies, join functionality, and sidebars, including loading and missing-pond handling.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Lists locally bookmarked lilies with loading states and removal options for unavailable posts.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Displays lilies filtered by tag with sorting, canonical redirects, pond context, and sidebar layout.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: Provides user account settings including username changes, avatar upload, froggy phrase management, admin tools, and joined pond management.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Tracks project state version, a high-level platform summary, and a list of implemented frontend and backend features with IDs, descriptions, synonyms, and versions.
